text:
1. Extend arms forward
2. Push off the wall or start position
3. Kick legs in a fluttering motion
4. Rotate body from side to side
5. Reach one arm forward while the other arm pulls back
6. Repeat arm movement in a continuous and coordinated manner
7. Breathe by turning head to the side
8. Continue kicking and rotating body
9. Maintain a streamlined body position
10. Repeat steps 5-9 in a rhythmic and continuous manner
